actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

actions.subcommittee: Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law

official_title: To extend for one year the exemption of returning workers from the numerical limitations for H-2B temporary workers.
short_title: Relief for America's Small and Seasonal Businesses Act

summary.text: Relief for America's Small and Seasonal Businesses Act - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to exempt certain returning H-2B aliens (temporary nonagricultural worker) from annual numerical limitations during FY2008.

titles.title: Relief for America's Small and Seasonal Businesses Act
To extend for one year the exemption of returning workers from the numerical limitations for H-2B temporary workers.
